Plot: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.
Title: The Savages
Actors: Laura Linney, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Philip Bosco, Peter Friedman
tomatoConsensus: Thanks to a tender, funny script from director Tamara Jenkins, and fine performances from Philip Seymour Hoffman and Laura Linney, this film delivers a nuanced, beautifully three-dimensional look at the struggles and comforts of family bonds.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 31 nominations.
